price: Taub, stumm und blind: So werden sie nicht umkehren.
arabic: صُمُّۢ بُكۡمٌ عُمۡيٞ فَهُمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: ṣummun buk'mun ʿum'yun fahum lā yarjiʿūna
